display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=J_vbMtQYOWgQ7kNvwFANr_5&_nc_oc=AdnjEl3Cjndfjp9vEc0OjHGvlxeiozYEokx4IxVZ7QRN3cXQfDBFIl9wR6OgwGSsQuM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Ggi3Kj6B_5lYdqeeg7Z8fQ&oh=00_AfPoAZfe11tuH5v1A6x-eA4EGVR87qbongAVmBb7aZE3Pg&oe=685D185D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=N-hUvpkhZkYQ7kNvwEqd7Am&_nc_oc=AdnPl80jLWM_LiNbtQM_RnBnF5aDxldZekw26NPUAHOf12seSShwL1mRkV_2pVvSAUQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Ggi3Kj6B_5lYdqeeg7Z8fQ&oh=00_AfNFrk8Vp1664QdDMHio5hkm70-whxxx6Th07HofLydJMw&oe=685D3252)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=YynLx_uVmloQ7kNvwFJQBOY&_nc_oc=AdmqH-Hvp-priFeosyKJmc2IWicsQ9m3Hg94QhqnPz3U4XkxwwnR6CduDzYAwDsUAxc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Ggi3Kj6B_5lYdqeeg7Z8fQ&oh=00_AfNLRcADfJis9M_EGTlBH5p8w9-ChNhNpzLo50v1d7OZWA&oe=685D3863)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=nFEw6vtT3cwQ7kNvwGxnHco&_nc_oc=AdkoinWX68n2f64H_Zsx5vnT_PNmSVhBwKZZRIq08vfSx8xTKY_izWihaOZXuIrcgMA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Ggi3Kj6B_5lYdqeeg7Z8fQ&oh=00_AfNyWkB2Z0vJWwHj82sRAqD-UM2NIN6_dy5WOq261sR8Jg&oe=685D2EEE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=nYd7RF_-CrEQ7kNvwE5DTte&_nc_oc=AdlrnJGXcR2gKsfRGAq_8g5Ui3ZcxiEpVS_RYn3wW4tbeiMswgW8bdvNBUmKEeeVyg4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Ggi3Kj6B_5lYdqeeg7Z8fQ&oh=00_AfNwx70OvcW2YIJ2U0EZPnM7OFQxBnSgMdkHPeldOYDmiQ&oe=685D36D6)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
